markdownRemark.excerpt: dont ask [sourcecode lang=“bash”] find . -name \*image\* -exec sh -vc ’ cp {} `echo {} |xargs basename| sed “s@\(.*\)\.jpg\|png\|bmp@\1@”`__`identify -verbose…
markdownRemark.html:
dont ask

[sourcecode lang=“bash”] find . -name \*image\* -exec sh -vc ’ cp {} `echo {} |xargs basename| sed “s@\(.*\)\.jpg\|png\|bmp@\1@”`__`identify -verbose {} | grep Geometry | sed -e “s@^.*Geometry: \([0-9]*\)\([x]*\)\([0-9]*\).*@__\1_\3@”`.`echo {} | sed “s@\(.*\)\.\(jpg\|png\|bmp\)@\2@”` ’ \; [/sourcecode]

frontmatter.title: script-fu: find all images and rename them, attaching resolution information to filename
script-fu: copy and create destination dir if it does not exist in linux
A year as an entrepreneur (and half, trying to)
